name: fix-helper
title: FIX Helper
description: Quickly parse, analyze, and understand FIX messages with ease.
author: tianwg

commands.name: fix-parser
commands.title: Parse FIX Messages
commands.subtitle: FIX Helper
commands.description: Parse Financial Information eXchange (FIX) protocol messages.

commands.name: fix-search-tags
commands.title: Search FIX Tags
commands.subtitle: FIX Helper
commands.description: Quickly search for FIX tags and view their details.

preferences.name: defaultVersion
preferences.title: Default Version
preferences.subtitle: FIX Helper
preferences.description: Fallback version when BeginString (Tag 8) is missing.

preferences.name: customDelimiter
preferences.title: Custom Delimiter
preferences.description: Prioritized delimiter. Falls back to standard ones (| ^ SOH) if not found.

preferences.name: showIcons
preferences.title: Show Icons
preferences.description: Display visual icons for tags and values.
preferences.label: Enabled

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
